about: Experienced Software Engineer with 5+ years of expertise in backend systems, distributed architectures, and cloud-native solutions. Certified Bar Raiser at Oracle, recognized for upholding technical excellence and guiding high-quality hiring decisions. Proven ability to design scalable systems in healthcare, education, and finance domains using Java, Python, Kafka, and OCI/AWS. Specialized in machine learning, applying techniques such as anomaly detection and generative AI to solve real-world problems and enhance system intelligence. Passionate about mentoring juniors, solving complex problems, and driving product impact through innovative technologies and continuous learning.

experience.title: Senior Member of Technical Staff (SDE-3) at Oracle
details: Working in Healthcare domain in XR team responsible for Clinical Reporting and output management.
Architected and implemented mro-gen-services, a Java Micronaut-based solution for generating medical record outputs.
Migrated Cerner enterprise applications to a modern architecture.
Built and led the India Clinical Reporting team.

experience.title: Software Engineer-2 at Google
details: Worked in Search India Education Team, developing features for exam OSRPs.
Built the Exam Quiz feature and migrated architecture.
Launched localized Exam OSRP with support for multiple languages.

experience.title: Software Development Engineer-1 at Amazon
details: Worked in Finance Automation Team to detect anomalies and duplicates in invoices.
Implemented ML-based rules discovering over 100M USD anomalies.
Built APIs, monitoring dashboards, and used AWS CDK.

experience.title: Problem Curator Intern at HackerEarth
details: Created and tested algorithmic problems for hiring contests.
Presented workshop on Advanced Data Structures and Algorithms.

30+ tech certifications over a decade; committed to continuous learning.
Participated in 3 hackathons, developing projects in ML and web development.
Secured World Rank 1 in Codechef October Challenge 2018 (DIV2).
Secured 2nd rank (out of 175 teams) in University Coding Contest at LPU.
Secured 5th rank in National Coding Contest 'ALOHOMORA' at NIT Durgapur.
Secured 21st rank in National Coding Contest at LNMIIT Jaipur.
Qualified for ACM-ICPC Regionals, secured 85th rank in Asia Gwalior-Pune Regional, 2018.
Secured 86th rank among 60,946 candidates in Rajasthan Pre-Engineering Test, 2014.
Secured 15,550 rank among 1.26 lakh candidates in JEE Advanced.
